diagnosis: Sleep Apnea with associated breathing difficulty

follow_up: Schedule appointment with sleep specialist within 2 weeks
Return to clinic in 1 month for evaluation
Immediate follow-up if breathing difficulties worsen
advice: Elevate head of bed by 6-8 inches
Weight loss if BMI is elevated
Avoid alcohol and sedatives before bedtime
Use CPAP machine as prescribed (if already prescribed)
Sleep on side rather than back
Exercise regularly but not close to bedtime
